title: Jesus Hates Zombies: Those Slack-Jaw Blues
description: This new and revised edition of the indie smash-hit features a painted cover by famed Marvel Zombies cover artist ARTHUR SUYDAM! A bonus story (featuring Sasquatch!) written by creator Stephen Lindsay and illustrated by Lauren Monardo is also included in this edition. If you missed it the first time around, then this second-coming of JESUS HATES ZOMBIES is just what you need!
author: Stephen Lindsay
